Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka will try to beat Bangladesh and still reach the playoffs but may not justify the bookmakers' trust due to recent economic crises.
Bangladesh performed no worse against Afghanistan and has every chance to win.
Sri Lankan players are experiencing stress due to their home state's economic crisis and may not fully concentrate on cricket.
Bangladesh is highly motivated to win as the winner of the face-to-face confrontation with Sri Lanka goes to the playoffs.
Sri Lanka lost to Afghanistan with a handicap of 8 wickets and is not in the best shape.
Bangladesh is considered a clear underdog by bookmakers, but the chances are at least equal in a face-to-face game.
